>
[Frightening Appearance](/Feats.aspx?ID=6433) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Vigilante" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=803" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 219 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Vigilante](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=267)

**Prerequisites**
[Startling Appearance](/Feats.aspx?ID=6429); Expert in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40)

</column>

---

Your dramatic appearances can frighten bystanders. When you make a Startling Appearance, you can also attempt to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=2395) each enemy in a 10-foot emanation you were [unnoticed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=98) by before your [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306).
